author: Not available

text.12: leohta hyrdes,      buton ðær to lafe þa get
text.13: wæs wintergeteles,      þæs ðe gewritu secgað,
text.14: seofon and twentig;      swa neah wæs sigora frean
text.15: ðusend aurnen,      ða þa ðis gelamp.
text.18: wintra on worulde,      ða þis geworden wæs,
text.19: and þa on ðam XXX wæs      ðeoden gehalgod.
text.4: beornas Baðan nemnaþ.      þær wæs blis micel
text.5: on þam eadgan dæge      eallum geworden,
text.7: Pentecostenes dæg.      þær wæs preosta heap,
text.9: gleawra gegaderod.      And ða agangen wæs

source: The Complete Corpus of Anglo-Saxon Poetry
